Articles.Content: I would like to fling some kerbals around using some sort of catapult, or multiple launch rocket system. An even better design would see this system employable on the mun, or some sorta plane you can launch EVA kerbal guided rockets. Basically I would like to see a variety of designs to launch/fling EVA suited kerbals.

I would like to fling some kerbals around using some sort of catapult, or multiple launch rocket system. An even better design would see this system employable on the mun, or some sorta plane you can launch EVA kerbal guided rockets. Basically I would like to see a variety of designs to launch/fling EVA suited kerbals.

My entry for my recent challenge thread was was the basic prototype for this idea, and funnily enough what I have been working on when i looked at this.

Put some ladders radially extending outward from the axis (easy way is with the long telescoping ladder and WASDQE). Kerbals on ladders will slide under force, and even just the spinning force of the pod\'s reaction wheel is enough to spin up an impressive Kerbifuge. I can hardly fathom what would happen if you used engines for the spinning... =P

I think I came up with a primitive catapult.

Able to launch kerbals with the greatest of ease to heights of atleast 4000m.

To use, simply apply jet exhaust directly to the kerbal.
